author: Jennifer Pocock
title: Setting standards of excellence for forensic nursing policy and practice
text:
In This Story
Associate Professor in the School of Nursing Katherine Scafide appointed to the inaugural American Academy of Forensic Sciences Standards Board Forensic Nursing Consensus Body.
Katherine Scafide, associate professor in the School of Nursing, has been appointed a founding member of the Forensic Nursing Consensus Body (CB) of the American Academy of Forensic Sciences Standards Board (ASB). Scafide and a dedicated team will collaborate to advance national forensic nursing standards.
“It is an honor to be a part of the first Forensic Nursing Consensus Body and to elevate the field of forensic nursing, fueled by the shared passion among my colleagues,” said Scafide.
The American Academy of Forensic Sciences (AAFS) is a multidisciplinary professional organization that advances science and its application to the legal system. Consensus Bodies focus on establishing forensic standards in specific disciplines. Each body is dedicated to the widespread formulation, adoption, and enforcement of recognized standards.
The Forensic Nursing Consensus Body will be responsible for developing, reviewing, and voting upon standards, guidelines, technical reports, and best practice recommendations in this discipline of forensic science.
Scafide’s revolutionary research in alternate light source and bruise detection is pioneering inclusivity, justice, and equity for domestic violence survivors of color. Her unique expertise stems from 20 years of experience in forensic nursing practice and research.
Congratulations Dr. Scafide!

author: @PublimetroMX
title: Valentina Gilabert tras la liberación de Marianne Gonzaga: "La perdono, todo el mundo se merece una segunda oportunidad"
text:
Después de que trascendiera que Marianne Gonzaga, de 17 años, fue liberada tras cinco meses de internamiento por agredir presuntamente a Valentina Gilabert con un arma blanca. Gilabert, en un gesto de reconciliación, expresó su perdón y apoyo a una segunda oportunidad para Gonzaga, bajo medidas cautelares dictadas por un juez.
Valentina Gilabert compartió un mensaje de conciliación a través de su cuenta de Instagram: “La perdono, todo el mundo se merece una segunda oportunidad en la vida y no soy nadie para privar a las personas de su libertad”, mencionó la modelo en su video.
Un nuevo comienzo
Gilabert destacó que Gonzaga se disculpó personalmente con ella y afirmó que no existen problemas entre ellas ni sus familias. “Llegamos a la conclusión que no hay problemas entre nosotras, entre nuestras familias ni legalmente ya, cada quien va a vivir su vida por aparte, una alejada de la otra”, señaló.
Con este acuerdo, ambas buscan dejar atrás el conflicto y seguir adelante, mientras Gonzaga deberá cumplir con las condiciones establecidas por el juez para mantener su libertad.
¿Cómo fue la agresión de Gonzaga a Gilabert?
El 5 de febrero de este año, Marianne Gonzaga, influencer de 17 años, fue arrestada en el conjunto Park Pedregal, Álvaro Obregón, Ciudad de México, acusada de atacar a Valentina Gilabert, de 18 años, con un arma blanca.
La agresión dejó a Gilabert con heridas graves en el cuello, tórax y manos, generando gran impacto en la opinión pública. Agentes de la Secretaría de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana detuvieron a Gonzaga, quien fue puesta a disposición de la Fiscalía General de Justicia de la Ciudad de México.
Debido a su edad, el caso se manejó bajo el sistema de justicia para adolescentes, y Gonzaga fue internada en un Centro Especializado para Mujeres Adolescentes en Tlalpan. Tras su detención, un juez especializado dictó una medida de internamiento de dos meses, pero el proceso se extendió por cinco meses bajo estricta reserva.
El 11 de febrero se llevó a cabo una audiencia clave, y este miércoles, tras negociaciones entre las familias y los abogados de ambas partes, se llegó a un acuerdo que permitió la liberación de Gonzaga.

author: Correspondent
title: Shahjahan Omar wins by big margin with boat symbol
text:
Shahjahan Omar, a former BNP leader who joined ruling Awami League just before the election, has won in the Jhalakathi-1 constituency, bagging 95,478 votes with the boat symbol.
His nearest contestant – Abu Bakar Siddique of Jaker Party – received only 1,624 votes in the election, according to unofficial results of the 12th parliamentary election.
A Salek, assistant returning officer and district election officer of Jhalakathi, said a total of 113,015 people cast votes in 90 centers of the constituency on Sunday. Of them, 99,890 votes were valid.
Among the other candidates, independent candidate Abul Kashem Fakhrul Islam received 370 votes with truck symbol, M Moniruzzaman, who stepped down from the electoral race, got 625 votes with eagle symbol, Bangladesh Congress Party candidate Mojibur Rahman 142 votes with coconut symbol, Trinamool BNP candidate Jasim Uddin Talukder 282 votes with golden fiber symbol.
Meanwhile, Jatiya Party candidate Ejajul Haque received 1,272 votes.
Shahjahan Omar was the vice-chairman of BNP and serving jail in a sabotage case. In a dramatic move, he came out of jail just before the election, joined the ruling party, and got nominated for the Jhalakathi-1 constituency.

author: María Emma Jiménez"/>
title: Colombia en llamas: ¿Cuáles son los tipos de incendio forestal?
text:
Colombia enfrenta una crisis ambiental. Los protagonistas son 31 incendios activos en todo el país. Ante esto, los cuerpos de bomberos de las ciudades, el Ejército, la Policía, alcaldes, el presidente y los ciudadanos trabajan a diario para apagar las llamas de los incendios.
La preocupación sobre los incendios es considerable, ya que se está viendo perjudicada la fauna, la flora y la salud de los colombianos, pues la calidad del aire ha disminuido. En Caracol Radio estuvo Scarleth Sánchez, líder de la comunidad “Paraíso” de Chapinero, y explicó la situación que vive cerca de uno de los incendios en Bogotá. La joven comentó que en la mañana de este 25 de enero amaneció “con la garganta bastante seca, porque el humo de los incendios se ha metido a las casas”
A su vez, lamentó lo que ocurre en el país y en especial en el cerro cerca a su casa. “Lo que uno ve es desolador, porque nosotros recorremos los cerros muy seguido. Pensar que todo eso está arrasado con la naturaleza, es tremendo para la vista, dan ganas de llorar. Es absurda la cantidad de terreno que se ha quemado ”.
Sánchez también comentó que la ciudadanía ha demostrado bastante interés por ayudar a apagar los incendios. “Ayer, nos encontrábamos personas mayores y jóvenes tratando de ayudar, para solventar la situación”.
En medio de esto, el presidente ha solicitado ayuda a distintos países que cuentan con los recursos técnicos para poder enfrentar este tipo de crisis. Al respecto, Estados Unidos, Chile, Perú y Canadá van a enviar ayuda contra los incendios , noticia que fue confirmada por el mismo mandatario.
¿Cuáles son los tipos de incendio forestal? El Idiger compartió detalles sobre los tipos de incendio forestal que se pueden presentar. Por el momento, solo hay tres categorías: Superficial, subterráneo y de copa.
Superficial: Al respecto, la entidad señaló que los incendios forestales son de tipo superficial cuando la afectación a la vegetación ocurre sobre el suelo. “Se consideran de este tipo cuando el material vegetal que el incendio consume son hierbas, ramas, hojas, hojarasca, que se encuentran a ras del suelo.” Además, indicó que la vegetación por sus componentes puede ser sensibles a los incendios. “Se considera combustible superficial a todo aquel que se encuentre entre la superficie del suelo y hasta 1,5m. de altura.”
Subterráneo: Los incendios son catalogados como tal cuando la afectación a la vegetación ocurre bajo la tierra. “En estos se queman las raíces bajo la superficie del suelo o la materia orgánica, acumulada en las fracturas de grandes afloramientos de roca. Arden lenta y latentemente, carecen de llama y pueden estar activos por largo tiempo. Son muy dañinos para toda la vegetación debido a su efecto de destrucción de las raíces”
De Copa: Los incendios más graves son los de tipo De Copa.“El fuego consume la totalidad de los árboles, propagándose tanto de copa en copa como superficialmente. Este tipo de incendio es muy peligroso y difícil de controlar”.

author: By
title: Good Samaritan OT shares her passion during Occupational Therapy Month
text:
SIOUX FALLS, S.D. (Dakota News Now) - April is Occupational Therapy Month, a month to recognize the impact occupational therapists have on people’s lives.
Anna Stach has been an OT for 12 years and works at the Good Samaritan Society Sioux Falls Center.
“We’re experts at working on what people want and need to be able to do in their daily lives, with a focus on quality of life and getting back their independence and maintaining that independence,” said Stach.
Stach sees eight to 10 patients a day, and every session is different in what goal they’re working toward.
“Some need to work on their balance and some need to work on their strength, so our focus is to work on those goals we have set for somebody to either transition home or just be more independent in the environment they’re living. We really focus on the activities that people want and need to be able to do, the things you need to do, brush your teeth, dress, take yourself to the bathroom, showering, but we can also look at things that you really just want to do. Maybe it’s gardening, maybe it’s crocheting, that’s really our focus,” said Stach.
Stach points out a career that focuses on helping people regain independence can be very rewarding.
“There’s so much pride and passion for being an OT just because we really are working on quality of life, a huge focus for our patient. So, when we leave, we know that we did something that helped that patient be more independent towards their goal. When somebody comes in and they’ve had a major condition and they’re going through a really hard time and we help them meet other patients that are also going through a really hard time and when they are able to walk out that door and go back home, it really is, it’s what we do it for,” said Stach.

author: Gopi
title: Tokyo voices concerns over Chinese aircraft's near-miss collision with Japanese patrol plane - Social News XYZ
text:
Tokyo, June 12 (SocialNews.XYZ) Tokyo on Thursday raised serious concerns over the incident of a near-miss collision between a Chinese aircraft and a Japanese Maritime Self-Defence Force (MSDF) patrol plane over international waters in the Pacific and urged Beijing to avoid any such recurrence.
Addressing a press conference, Japanese Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi said that Japan's stance was conveyed to China through diplomatic and defence channels over the incident.
"The government has raised serious concerns with the Chinese side, including to the Chinese ambassador in Tokyo, through the vice minister of foreign affairs, and has strongly urged them to prevent such incidents from recurring," Hayashi said
"We decline to comment on what China intended (by the manoeuvres), but these peculiar approaches by the Chinese military aircraft could have caused a collision," Hayashi said.
The Chief Cabinet Secretary stated that Japan will continue "to spare no effort to ensure vigilance and surveillance activities in the airspace and waters surrounding Japan in order to resolutely defend Japan's territorial waters, airspace, and territorial rights."
Earlier this week, the Japanese Defence Ministry announced that it had spotted two Chinese aircraft carriers -- the Shandong and Liaoning conducting operations in the Pacific for the first time.
The Japanese Defence Ministry on Wednesday said that the Chinese military aircraft, which took off from the aircraft carrier Shandong, had a near miss with a Japanese patrol plane over the high seas in the Pacific, as it flew as close as 45 meters to the MSDF P-3C aircraft at the same altitude.
It further stated that the Chinese J-15 warplane also made other dangerous manoeuvres over the weekend, such as passing in front of an MSDF P-3C aircraft at the same altitude and with a distance of about 900 meters between the planes.
The Ministry said that Japan lodged a protest with China and "expressed serious concerns" since "these abnormal approaches by a Chinese military plane may cause an accidental collision."
According to Japanese media outlet Kyodo News, Japan has been on high alert with China's military expanding activities and the simultaneous operation of two of its aircraft carriers, the Shandong and Liaoning, in the Pacific.
Source: IANS
About Gopi
Gopi Adusumilli is a Programmer. He is the editor of SocialNews.XYZ and President of AGK Fire Inc.
He enjoys designing websites, developing mobile applications and publishing news articles on current events from various authenticated news sources.

title: Se filtra el mail por el que Elon Musk incursionó en la IA | “Si no podemos parar la IA, al menos que Google no sean los primeros”
text: Gracias a los conflictos legales entre Musk y Altman, se dió a conocer esta conversación"/
